contentrichtext.text: {{more|mill town}} A [[mill town]], also known as factory town or mill village, is typically a settlement that developed around one or more mills or factories (usually cotton mills or factories producing textiles). As a location, '''Milltown''' may refer to: ==Places== ===Canada=== *[[Milltown, Newfoundland and Labrador]] ===Ireland=== *[[Milltown, County Cavan]] *[[Milltown, County Kerry]] *[[Milltown, Dublin]], a suburb of Dublin *[[Milltown, County Galway]] *[[Milltown, County Kildare]] *[[Milltown, County Westmeath]] *[[Milltown Malbay]], County Clare *[[Glenmalure Park]] or Milltown, the former home of Shamrock Rovers F.C. ===United Kingdom=== *[[Milltown, Cornwall]], England *[[Milltown, Derbyshire]], England *[[Milltown, County Antrim]], a village in Northern Ireland *[[Milltown, County Down]], a townland in County Down, Northern Ireland *[[Milltown Cemetery]], a cemetery in Belfast ===United States=== *[[Milltown, California]], alternate name of Burkeville *[[Milltown, Indiana]] *[[Milltown, Kentucky]] *[[Milltown, New Jersey]] *[[Milltown, South Dakota]] *[[Milltown, West Virginia]] *[[Milltown, Wisconsin]] *[[Milltown (town), Wisconsin]] *[[Milltown, Virginia]] ===Other=== * [[Milltown Reservoir Superfund Site]] on the Clark Fork River Basin in Montana, USA * [[Earl of Milltown]], title in the Peerage of Ireland * [[Milltown GAA]], Gaelic Athletic Association club in Kildare * [[Milltown GAC]], Gaelic Athletic Association club in Galway * [[RAF Milltown]] ==See also== *[[Miltown]], a brand name for the mild tranquilizer meprobamate *[[Mill town]], a settlement that developed around one or more mills or factories *[[Milton (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
